      • attack

        public boolean attack(Entity e)
        Logic for attacking an entity.
        Parameters:
        e - The entity to attack.
        Returns:
        Whether attack landed, false if entity is already dead.

        Lower health of this entity.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to lower this entity's health.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Kills off this entity by setting isDead to true, will be removed in ClientHandler.

      • getIsDead

        public boolean getIsDead()
        Returns if this entity is dead or alive.
        Returns:
        Whether this entity is dead or not (and hence should be removed).
